channel.title: Item definitions? (317)
channel.description:
Does anybody have a full item definitions file, containing all stuff: stats, atk spds, stackable or not, members or not, weight, actions etc etc. Dumping the client cache only yields item name/desc/actions possible.
I tried searching first of course, thank you to my savior.

item.title: Item definitions? (317)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:12, topic:544510”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=663385.msg4433498#msg4433498 date=1404244613]

There’s also this, but it isn’t full (no equip and some other stuff)
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/configuration/369973-unknown-revision-20-694-item-definitions.html

:palm: Pretty sure he only wants the 317 item definitions. Correct me if I am wrong, Pure.

Wow we have sherlock fucking holmes here tonight. I know he wants 317 stuff. I couldn’t find full definitions like he wanted, so instead I gave him similar ones that I figured may help in his cause. You ignorant twat waffle.
[/quote]

2006Scape gives all that.[/quote]That is lacking some data too…

Read full topic

That’s basically all I found (didn’t search very long)
[/quote]I guess I’ll just trim all the non-317 items.

edit: I’ll probably convert this to a less verbose format and post it here.
edit2: some of this looks wrong…

[quote] “name”: “Cannon base”,
…
“equipmentType”: “WEAPON”,[/quote][/quote]

I’m pretty sure that user, Maui asks for common sense help.

Read full topic
